description:
Reliable Presta valves for your tubeless conversion. Since 2001 Stan’s No Tubes has been the name in tubeless tire technology, and these valves do the Stan’s name proud.

  • 35mm length works with rims up to 20mm deep
  • 44mm length works with rims up to 28mm deep
  • Removeable core for easy sealant top ups
  • Colour options let you have fun getting matchy-matchy
  • Sold as a pair
name: Stan's No Tubes Presta Valves
